iata:chargeSummaryPrepaidCollectIndicato.description: Code indicating whether the payment of Other Charges will be made at origin (prepaid) or at destination (collect) Maximum of 2 occurrences

iata:chargeSummaryWeightChargeAmount.description: Indicates the amount of the weight/volume charge. Element values limited to range 0.000-999999999999

iata:chargeSummaryValuationChargeAmount.description: Indicates the amount of the valuation charge. Element values limited to range 0.000-999999999999

iata:chargeSummaryTaxAmount.description: Indicates the amount of the applicable tax. Element values limited to range 0.000-999999999999

iata:chargeSummaryTotalOtherChargesDueAg.description: Indicates the total amount of charges due to the Agent. Element values limited to range 0.000-999999999999

iata:chargeSummaryTotalOtherChargesDueCa.description: Indicates the total amount of charges due to the Carrier. Element values limited to range 0.000-999999999999

iata:chargeSummaryRatingTypeIndicator.description: Indicates if the rate is a face, published or actual rate. F for Face, P for Published, or A for Actual Rating detail. Face Rate refers to the freight rate mentioned on the Air Waybill. Actual Rate refers to the actual freight rate applied to the Shipmentl. Published Rate refers to the freight rate that is public information (e.g. TACT) and therefore largely indisputable. Note: There is possibility that Face rate is the same as Published rate Default Rating Type Indicator value is F i.e. Face

iata:chargeSummaryTotalChargeAmount.description: Indicates the total amount of the Prepaid/Collect charge in origin currency. Element values limited to range 0.000-999999999999
